steps.content: What was the actual enrollment count of the clinical trial on H. pylori in acne vulgaris patients from Jan-May 2018 as listed on the NIH website?

plan: Search for the clinical trial on H. pylori in acne vulgaris patients on the NIH website.
Locate the specific trial that was active from January to May 2018.
Check the trial details for the enrollment count information.
Extract the actual enrollment count from the trial details.
